name: Dungeon Glitchers VR
description:
You woke up with a unique ability. Glitching... Will you be able to solve all the puzzles?

Dungeon Glitchers VR is a VR puzzle game with an interesting game mechanic. Use the power of glitching to  solve the puzzles and finish the game.

Dungeon Glitchers VR is just a prototype demo made in 5 days. I might continue working on this game in the future, but for now its just an idea.

This demo is made for our weekly game jam project for the Unity/C# education of the "PISMO" incubator in Novska, HR.

Team members and roles are:
Game Designer/Programmer/Level Designer: Matej Jelić (https://krugisa.itch.io/)

Minimum system requirements :  

Windows 10

Platforms: Oculus rift or Oculus rift S

Processor : Intel i5 4460 

Gpu : Amd radeon RX 580

Ram : 8 gb

Storage : 1 gb

Thank you and Have fun!
